title: Adopt governance bundle with hard PR gate for Copilot and Cursor

context.problem: Agent-generated changes require deterministic and machine-verifiable provenance artifacts for auditability.
constraints: Primary enforcement must be a CI hard gate
Hook-level enforcement must remain best effort and low friction

decision: Introduce a repository-local governance bundle that records GEN events via hooks and enforces DEC linkage for risk-triggered changes.
consequences: PRs touching risk-triggered paths will fail without a valid DEC reference, while meaningful changes require GEN event artifacts.

risk.rationale: Governance policy and CI enforcement changes can affect merge throughput and should be explicitly approved.
